name: forensix
description: Google Chrome forensic tool to process, analyze and visualize browsing artifacts
readme_summary: ForensiX is a Google Chrome forensic tool designed to process, analyze, and visually present browsing artifacts. It helps investigators extract and understand user activity, personal information, and system metadata from Chrome profiles.
key_features: Mounting of volume with Google Chrome data in read-only mode with hash checking
Suspect profile and behavior estimations (personal info, Chrome/system metadata, login frequency, browsing activity heatmaps)
Browsing history analysis (transition types, visit durations)
primary_use_case: Digital forensics and investigation of user browsing activity on Google Chrome.
cover_image_prompt: A digital detective, wearing a magnifying glass as a monocle, meticulously sifts through a swirling vortex of digital information representing a Google Chrome browser profile. Streams of data, like URLs, login credentials, and timestamps, flow from the vortex towards the detective, who is organizing them onto a large, illuminated corkboard. The corkboard displays a timeline with highlighted activity periods, a heatmap of website visits, and extracted personal details. Subtle glowing lines connect related pieces of information, symbolizing the analysis process. The repository name 'ForensiX' is subtly etched onto the detective's briefcase. The scene is set in a dimly lit, high-tech investigation room, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a cool, analytical color palette and glowing data elements.

name: pennywiseai-tracker
description: PennyWise automatically reads transaction SMS messages and transforms them    into organized financial data with on-device AI assistance. No manual   entry, no cloud processing, complete privacy.
readme_summary: PennyWise AI is a privacy-focused Android application that automatically tracks expenses by parsing transaction SMS messages using on-device AI. It organizes financial data, detects subscriptions, and provides insights without sending any data to the cloud.
primary_use_case: Automatic, private expense tracking for Android users by parsing SMS messages.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, old owl perched on a stack of SMS messages, meticulously sorting them into labeled financial categories like 'food', 'bills', and 'shopping'. The owl uses a magnifying glass that glows with a subtle AI aura, highlighting key transaction details within the messages. Below the owl, a clean, organized timeline of financial data is being projected onto a digital scroll. Small, unobtrusive icons representing currency symbols and charts float around the scene. The overall mood is one of calm efficiency and privacy, with a soft, natural lighting. The art style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic, emphasizing clarity and a touch of whimsy.

name: arwes
readme_summary: ARWES is a web framework for building user interfaces with a futuristic sci-fi aesthetic. It provides components and tools inspired by science fiction designs, animations, and sound effects, aiming to create advanced technological interfaces.
key_features: Inspired by Cyberprep, Star Citizen, Halo, NIKKE, Mecha Break
Focus on advanced science and technology aesthetics
primary_use_case: Developing web user interfaces with a distinct futuristic science fiction theme and visual style.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist, dressed in futuristic cybernetic gear, is meticulously sculpting a vibrant, holographic user interface from raw streams of glowing data. The interface displays intricate sci-fi elements like animated readouts, complex schematics, and pulsating energy flows. Around the artist, subtle visual cues like floating code snippets and digital particles hint at the underlying web framework. The scene is set in a sleek, minimalist studio with neon accents and a view of a futuristic cityscape. The overall mood is one of creative innovation and technological advancement. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a vibrant, high-tech color palette.

name: snapdrop-android
description: Android client for local file sharing via https://pairdrop.net and self-hosted snapdrop
readme_summary: Snapdrop-Android is an Android client for the open-source local file sharing solution PairDrop (and Snapdrop). It offers seamless integration with the Android OS, allowing users to share files quickly and easily from any app directly to other devices on the same local network, functioning as a modern, cross-platform alternative to older transfer methods.
key_features: Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, Linux, Android, iPhone, Mac)
primary_use_case: Quick and easy local file transfer between Android devices and other computers/smartphones on the same network, bypassing traditional slow or cumbersome methods.
cover_image_prompt: A vibrant 3D isometric illustration depicting a stylized Android robot effortlessly passing a glowing digital file packet to a friendly-looking laptop and a smartphone. The Android robot is positioned centrally, with a clear 'share' icon emanating from its hand. The file packet is translucent, showing abstract data streams. Subtle Wi-Fi signal waves connect the devices, indicating local network transfer. In the background, a clean, minimalist cityscape suggests a modern digital environment. Small, unobtrusive UI elements resembling a simplified Snapdrop interface are visible on the laptop and smartphone screens. The overall mood is efficient and user-friendly, with a bright, clean color palette. The repository name 'Snapdrop-Android' is subtly integrated into a small digital banner at the bottom.
